meanings.definition: A type of fly used in fishing, with wings made of hair.
meanings.sent1: The hairwing fluttered in the wind as the fisherman cast his line.
meanings.sent2: I tied a hairwing onto my fishing line to attract the trout.
meanings.sent3: The hairwing fly thought it was a bird and tried to land on a tree.
meanings.sent4: The hairwing danced gracefully on the water, tempting the fish below.
meanings.sent5: The hairwing's delicate hair wings shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing the fish.

meanings.definition: The wing of a fly used in fishing, made of hair.
meanings.sent1: I carefully examined the hairwing of the fly to ensure it was secure.
meanings.sent2: The hairwing of the fly was intricately crafted with fine strands of hair.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the hairwing for a tasty snack and tried to nibble on it.
meanings.sent4: The hairwing of the fly was like a delicate brush painting the sky with its movements.
meanings.sent5: The hairwing's hair-made wing glistened in the sunlight, attracting the attention of the fish below.
